shortForecast: Freezing Rain Likely then Light Rain
name: Tonight
detailedForecast: Freezing rain likely between 9pm and midnight, then rain and freezing rain likely between midnight and 1am, then rain and freezing rain likely and patchy fog. Cloudy. Low around 27, with temperatures rising to around 40 overnight. South wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.
